author: stefan2
msg: On the fsfs-improvements branch:  Some actual refactoring.
Factor out some low-level functions processing representations
and their delta chains.  Also, substitute calls to the static
get_root_changes_offset with svn_fs_fs__rev_get_root API calls
in a few places (prepares for the following commit).
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/fs_fs.c
(create_rep_state,
build_rep_list): add missing spaces in comments
(check_rep): new utility function factored out from verify_walker
(rep_chain_length): new utility function factored out from choose_delta_base
(choose_delta_base,
verify_walker): use new utilities
(get_changes): tighter variable scope; use svn_fs_fs__revision_exists API
instead of static ensure_revision_exists
(recover_body,
hotcopy_update_current): use svn_fs_fs__rev_get_root API
